forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 44F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around -0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
